data.text: Yeyo ikatema iyo, Yesu aari aviraka variyari imata cho ingaano Nihuku no Wiittuwa. Owiittucha awe aari anawolhiye ithalha, nkayontha machashi o ingaano ni ukhuura imbeyu chaya.
Amafarisayo yooneke chiicho, nkayaamwirelha Yesu, “Mwooneke, owiittucha inyu anopanga ittu ichiichihiye ni Malhehero wiira ihipangiye Nihuku no Wiittuwa!”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani mwaatti khannashoma chaapannge aya Adaudi vamoka ni ashikhunanaya vaawolhiye aya ithalha?

Ahokelha Inupa ya Nlhuku, anene vamoka ni ashikhunanaya nkayaalhia mikatte chaakumihiye isadaka wa Nlhuku, inakhalhaka yaari ahittwaraka Malhehero a ashinna Musa wo ulhia chechiyo mikatte chiyo. Ukhalhawaya opochera ishaani vekha aya phi ahaachiichihiya ulhia.
Ama chani, khanashoma nhina Malhehero wiira kila Nihuku no Wiittuwa attu opochera ishaani wi Inupa ya Nlhuku ari ahivaraka malhehero o Nihuku no Wiittuwa, nansho ahiirelhiyaka wiira ahotteka?
Paahi, kinouhimeriani vano wiira hawo vaa ntu ri mulhupalhe upwaha Inupa ya Nlhuku.
Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Ikiriri phi nothanana aka ni mena kihiwe isadaka ya ashinama.’ Mwachuwelhaka maana aya, khannaahukumulha attu ahittekilhe,
ukhalhawaya Mwaana a Ntu phi Mwanene Nihuku no Wiittuwa.”
Yesu ahothama vavawo nkaakelha mu inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku,
mwaari awe ntu mmoka o moono wo uririyacha. Attu yaathanana umwootheria Yesu wiira hotteka, nkayankoha, “Chani, vahorera unlhamiha ntu Nihuku no Wiittuwa?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mpani munlhokoni mwinyu ikhondoro awe yawulhuwelhaka munlhikitini Nihuku no Wiittuwa, hinorwaa ni ukumiha munlhikitini mmo?
Ntu phi ri o waalhakelhelhiya chinene upwaha ikhondoro! Paahi etu, khanichiichihiye umoopolha ntu Nihuku no Wiittuwa.”
Amalheke nkaamwirelha ntu o moono wo uririyacha ulhe, “Wookolheke moono awo.”
Paahi etu Amafarisayo nkayaakhumacha vathe, nkayeewanana iphiro yo umwiiva Yesu.
Nansho Yesu vaachuwenlhe awe nenno nlhove nno, nkaathama vavawo vakitu vawo, ni attu enchi nkayanttwara. Nkaalhamiha areta onkhaye
nkaalhehera wiira ahaahimerie attu akina yayo malhove ayo.
Enre chiicho wiira malhove aahimiye ni Nlhuku wo iphiro ya anamilhohi ashinna Isaya atimire,
“Ulha phi namitheko aka kinthanlhe aka,
Khanokhalha ni nikhanyerero mena khannyakulha,
Khanontha nthalhe unyakathelhe,
Wo yoyo, makosho onkhaye anoowa aakhulhuvelha nchina nawe.”
Vavawo attu nkayanrwehelha Yesu ntu mmoka o hoona ni uhulhumacha aattukiye ni nshoka no unanara. Yesu nkanlhamiha, nkoolhumacha ni woona.
Nlhoko wa attu nkawoomiya uwanoni nkayeera, “Chani, nowooria ulha ukhalha mwaana a Adaudi?”
Amafarisayo yeeweke ulha mwaha ulha, nkayeera, “Ulha ntu ulha noomolha mashoka wo ikuru yo Belzebuli, nholhelhi o mashoka o unanara.”

Yesu nkaachuwelha choopuwelha aya munrimani, nkeerelha, “Imwene iriyoothe imianelhe milhoko miilhi chihineewanana, yeyo khinolhokelha. Ni iwani iriyoothe ama nikosho niriyoothe nimianne milhoko milhoko chihineewanana inowulhuwa.
Yakhalhaka umwene mmoka unaatakana ni umwene nkina wo machiri a Nakare, yoyo uhomalha umwalhaana unowulhuwa!
Mwaattiva nneera eti kinoomolha mashoka wo ikuru yo Belzebuli. Chani, owiittucha inyu etu anoomolha wo ikuru ya apani? Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo yayo phi nohalha uhukumulhani wiira nhotteka!
Mena kahiwe Nakare, nansho Iphumu ya Nlhuku, phi nokivaha ikuru yo woomolha mashoka, uhimiechesha wiira, Umwene wa Nlhuku uhooweelhani mwaattiva.
“Wo ikekhiaye, khaawo ntu nooria ukelha inupa ya ntu o machiri ni umwaakha nhakhu awe, mpaka anttukeke thoko ntu o machiri uyo, vavawo pinohalha awe wooria umwaakha nhakhu awe.
“Ntu riyothe hirii vamoka ni mii yoyo nookivinga, ntu hinokikaviha ukhungura yoyo noomwarusha.
Ni mii kinouhimeriani wiira attu anoohiyereriya uwonya ni ulhava waya wonkhaye, nansho khanowa aahiyereriya nlhatu wo unruwana Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
Ntu riyoothe noolhumacha nlhove no unlhava Mwaana a Ntu nohiyereriya, nansho ntu noolhumacha nlhove no unlhava Iphumu ya Nlhuku, khanohiyeriya, mwiilhaponi mu, mena ilhapo inowa.
“Wiira mpatte maphepu oombone nnothananiya waalha mwiri wookonda, mwiri waahikondeke, maphepu aya khanolhoka. Mwiri unochuwaniaa chineera aya wo wimma.
Mwaati iyari yo inwaa vaa nnohalha wooria chani uhimia malhove oombone uno nnari o uhilhoka? Ukhalhawaya malhaku a ntu anohimia chittu chiri munrimani.
Ntu o nrima woombone noyara chittu choombone munhakhuni mwo chittu chawe choombone, ni ntu o uhilhoka noyara chittu cho uhilhoka munhakhuni mwawe mwo uhilhoka mmo.
“Paahi, kinouhimeriani nchuwelhe wiira, Nihuku no Uhukumulhiya attu, kila ntu nowa aakhulha vachulhu wo kila nlhove no uhikhalha marumbo noolhumanche awe.
Malhove inyu phi nohalha uhukumulhani wiira nhotteka ama nhopanga moombone.”
Yamalheke, owiittuchiha Malhehero akina ni Amafarisayo nkayanlhelha Yesu, “Owiittuchiha, ninothanana woona mpangaka ithikineha.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwinre chani attu o uhilhoka o ulhuva va! Nnovekelha woona cho ushangiha? Mena! Ithikineha inohalha inyu woonihiya iri ya anamilhohi Nayona vekha aya.
Iphiro yaakhanlhe aya Nayona mahuku mararu uthana ni uhiyu mmirimani mwo nankumi, phi chiicho Mwaana a Ntu chinohalha awe ulhokelha unaminepa wuuthi ilhapo mahuku mararu uthana ni uhiyu.

Nihuku no Uhukumulhiya attu, attu o Uninavi anowa weemelha ni uhimia milhatu chinyu, ukhalhawaya ahomalha ukhoroma ni uhiya uwonya veewilhe aya nttenga u Nayona, ni mii vano kinouhimeriani wiira hawo mulhupalhe vaa naapwaha Nayona!

Nihuku no Uhukumulhiya attu nno, Ahano o Usheeba anowa weemelha ni uhimiacha milhatu chinyu, ukhalhawaya yayo aheeta ukhuma utayi, nkaawa wiiwelhelha malhove o irusho a Naselemani. Nansho kinouhimeriani wiira vaa hawo ri mulhupalhe waapwaha Naselemani!
“Nshoka no unanara vanoomolhiya aya mwiiruttuni mwa ntu, ninoovira naarukureriacha muuthakoni naaviaka vakittu vo wiittuwa. Naahooneke,
vavawo phi neera aya, ‘Kinohokolhiaa unupani waka.’ Kuhokolhiaka ni uphwanya inupa mwaari, inakwechiye ni urerihiya.

Phi norwaa aya ni waakusha mashoka makina saba o uhilhoka upwaha uyo, nkayaawacha ni ukhalha mwiiruttuni mwa ntu uyo. Vanomalha aya, ukumi wa ntu uyo vano unokhalha wo unanara upwaha khalhayi. Phi chiicho chinohalha aya ukhalha wa attu o uhilhoka a alha mahuku alha.”
Yesu aari olhumachaka ni nlhoko wa attu ikatema anumwane ni ashilhoko awe vaawilhe aya. Nkayeemelhacha vathe, athananaka umulhumana.
Paahi ntu mmoka nkaamwirelha, “Nkoonani, anumwaninyu ni ashihima inyu arii vathe vawo, anothanana uwoonani.”
Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Anumwanaka phi apani? Ashilhoko aka phi apani?”
Amalheke nkaathonya owiittucha awe, nkeera, “Mwooneke alha va! Alha phi manyaanumwanaka ni ashilhoko aka!
Ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe nopanga chinothanana aya Athithi ari wiirimu, yoyo phi nhima aka ni mwanrokoraka ni phi anumwanaka.”
